articles.title: Crispin Odey Assault Allegations: Morgan Stanley to Sever Ties With Investor - Bloomberg
articles.description: City of London firms have started distancing themselves from hedge fund manager Crispin Odey, hours after the publication of fresh allegations of sexual assault against women over several decades.
